childMarkdownRemark.html:
We acquired the remaining chakki Ata (Wheat Flour) and created more ration packages.

Now the loaders / labors will be called in to gradually start distribution from tomorrow. We will start going to 2-3 villages a day (from the list of villages shared earlier) in sha Allah

Ration Packages Ready for Frist Round

The banner in the video has Kanata, Ontario mis-spelled as Katana ðŸ™‚, but it is the spirit that matters ðŸ˜Š

We acquired the remaining chakki Ata (Wheat Flour) and created more ration packages.

Now the loaders / labors will be called in to gradually start distribution. We will start going to 2-3 villages a day (from the list of villages shared earlier) in sha Allah
